welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mastic Beach! Nestled on the beautiful Long Island coast, this charming city is known for its stunning beaches and quaint small-town charm. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mastic Beach has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport caters to executive and private aircrafts.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
